sql.name: queryXhFkglList
sql.sqlString: select a.LOAN_CODE,/*借款编码*/ a.JKRXM,/*借款人姓名*/ a.STATE as jkzt,/*借款状态*/ b.JKHTBM,/*合同编码*/ b.HTJE,/*合同金额*/ b.STATE,/*合同状态*/ c.FKJE,/*放款金额*/ c.FKSJ,/*放款时间*/ c.CREATE_BY,/*操作人员*/ c.ID as FKID,/*放款ID*/ a.ID, b.ID as HTID/*合同ID*/ from XH_JKSQ a inner join xh_jkht b on a.id=b.jksq_id left join XH_JYGL c on a.id=c.jksq_id where 1=1 and a.state=60 $sql
